property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If you block this attack, your opponent loses X vitality. X equals the block modifier of your block. R: After your opponent removes any number of cards from the game, they lose 2 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After your opponent fails a control check, remove the checked card in their discard pile from the game. E: Your attack gets +2 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F: Your control checks to play attacks get +2 for the rest of this turn while this card is in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: First F Lose 2 vitality: Until the beginning of your next turn, whenever a player removes a card from the game due to another card's effect, they also remove the top card of their deck from the game. R Commit 1 foundation: After your opponent plays an ability that gains vitality, they lose X vitality instead. X equals half of the vitality (rounded up) they would have gained.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit, destroy an asset: Destroy 1 asset. [Evil] R Commit: After you make a control check, remove the checked card form the game and re-check. [Death] E Commit: Each player may only play 1 more enhance this Enhance Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this attack is in your card pool, if your opponent would gain vitality due to a card effect, discard this card from your card pool to have them lose X vitality instead. X equals the amount of vitality they would have gained.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, remove the top card of your opponent's deck from the game. If that removed card is an asset, remove another card from the top of your opponent's deck from the game.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: If this attack deals damage, remove a card in your opponent's discard pile from the game.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: Remove 2 cards from your opponent's staging area from the game. E: If this attack deals damage, remove 2 foundations from your opponent's staging area form the game.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Zhao Daiyu Only - Combo (Mid Attack, Low Attack)

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, your opponent may not play enhance abilities printed on foundations during your next attack this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack deals damage, the control check to play your next ranged attack this turn gets +1.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your opponent readies a foundation during their Combat Phase, commit a card in your opponent's staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Choose 1 non-attack card in your opponent's card pool and remove it from the game. Only playable during your attack.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Remove this card from the game: Add the top card of your discard pile to your momentum.

property.name: CardText

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Destroy this foundation: After your opponent cancels 1 of your card effects, destroy a card in their staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Destroy this foundation: After your opponent plays an asset into their card pool, add that asset to the top of their deck. E Commit: Choose 1 card in your opponent's card pool and remove it from the game. Only playable during your attack.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Destroy this foundation: After your opponent plays a response ability on their character card, cancel that effect.
